jexxus.server
Interface ServerConnectionListener

public interface ServerConnectionListener

A class which implements this interface are able to control the events given off by the server.

Author:
Jason

Method Summary
 void clientDisconnected(ServerConnection disconnected, boolean forced)
          Called whenever a client gets disconnected from the server.
 void receive(byte[] ret, ServerConnection sender)
          Every time data is sent to the server, this method is called.
 

Method Detail

receive

void receive(byte[] ret,
             ServerConnection sender)
Every time data is sent to the server, this method is called.

Parameters:
data - The data which was sent by the server.
sender - The client who sent the data.

clientDisconnected

void clientDisconnected(ServerConnection disconnected,
                        boolean forced)
Called whenever a client gets disconnected from the server.

Parameters:
disconnected - The client who got disconnected.
forced - True if the server forcefully disconnected the client.
